message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I was hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Would you consider selling it for $120?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135.
